headline: Private Market Operating System Bridge Closes $5.1 Million Seed Financing, Led by Thicket Ventures
summary: Bridge, the first AI-native operating system purpose-built for private markets allocators, will use the funding to expand its team and accelerate its product rollout.NEW YORK, Oct. 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Bridge, the first AI-native operating system purpose-built for private markets allocators, today announced the close of its $5.1 million Seed financing led by Thicket Ventures. The capital raise will allow Bridge to meet market demand by significantly expanding its team and accelerating pr
